title: Analysis of Micro-Credentialing Policies and Practices: Case Studies from Middle Eastern and North African Universities (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematics education completion experience or basic understanding of digital credential systems
context.additional_context: Deriving educational policy improvements by analyzing short-term credentialing cases in mathematics

learning_goals: The current status of micro-credentialing policies in Middle Eastern and North African universities can be analyzed using quantitative data
Instructional design standards can be proposed based on curriculum integration cases in mathematics
A credential issuance system operable in resource-constrained technological environments can be designed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
